cu.explanation_en: Setting the hardware log level to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause the hardware logging subsystem to fail initialization and prevent proper hardware event logging.

du.explanation_en: Setting the hardware log level to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause the hardware logging subsystem to fail initialization and prevent proper hardware event logging.
du.explanation_zh: 將硬體日誌級別設定為無效值 'invalid' 會導致硬體日誌子系統初始化失敗，並阻止正確的硬體事件記錄。
